questionText: Repeated U.S. Supreme Court rulings have found that creationism is not science
author: A2YKW761AK4ZGY

questionText: In America, 40% of scientists believe in God.
author: A2YKW761AK4ZGY

questionText: Biology and other aspects of science cannot be mastered without first understanding evolution.
author: A2Q3FS9G8ITCN7

questionText: Proponents of 'Creation Science' believe a divine being created humans and other species a mere 10,000 years ago.
author: A2Q3FS9G8ITCN7

questionText: Two basic perspectives are at the core of the debate over teaching of evolution
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Evolution theory explains why there is diversity among species.
author: A2YKW761AK4ZGY

questionText: Intelligent design avoids mention of God.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: Proponents of Creation Science use the bible as the ultimate authority on how the world was formed.
author: A2YKW761AK4ZGY

questionText: The Big Bang Theory, suggests that the universe originated in a colossal explosion about 15 billion years ago.
author: A2IU5TX5S0FA1C
